overview: The successful development of a new type of AI smart chip has triggered violent seizures by foreign forces. In order to protect the chip, Zhanfeng was seriously injured and lost his memory. In the process of searching for the memory and the whereabouts of the chip, while fighting against foreign forces, they also uncovered the grievances and grievances between Dai Xingguo and Nie Lingfeng over the years.
title: Battle Front: Duel of the Peaks
